body:
I might take this opportunity to make another point. I followed the instructions on:

https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/WindowsBuild

Which recommended:

https://github.com/golang/winstrap

which is what I used. This program installs the compiler from TDM-GCC. I later installed the latest TDM-GCC version (5.1) instead of 4.9. So, it's not like I went all wild west here. :-) 

I also tried the manual MingW/Msys route but it never worked for me. So. That may give you context into my build environment.
